BackstoryDef.title: acolyte
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} had a childhood, but no longer lets it define {PAWN_objective}. It no longer matters. {PAWN_nameDef} became a justiciar - that is all that matters.

BackstoryDef.title: dark justiciar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a dark justiciar. The Dark God blessed {PAWN_objective} with power and demands unflinching loyalty in return. Nothing is beneath {PAWN_nameDef} if the Dark God commands it.
